column1: '''''Orcrist'' 1''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Orcrist (journal)

First printing in plain green cover. The 4th printing (1968) had cover illustrations by Laura Haglund: the front cover was called "Niggle -- by Leaf" while the back cover was untitled but depicted three hobbits.<ref>{{webcite
